title: Bug 128928[Build2.0.1][Eclipse 3.0]: InteractivityToggleVisibility work incorrectly.
description: Bug 128928[Build2.0.1][Eclipse 3.0]: InteractivityToggleVisibility work incorrectly. [Build2.0.1][Eclipse 3.0][Firefox 1.5]: InteractivityToggleVisibility work incorrectly.Steps:1.Create a bar chart2.Open chart builder, go to "Format Chart" tab, select chart area,select "Series Toggle visibility"3.Preview in web viewerActual Results:1.Click the legend, the series is unvisible, then click again, the series is still unvisibleExpected Results:1.ToggelVisibility can work correctly.
